metadata.title: CVE-2017-5944 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The dashboard subscription interface in Request Tracker (RT) 4.x before4.0.25, 4.2.x before 4.2.14, and 4.4.x before 4.4.2 might allow remoteauthenticated users with certain privileges to execute arbitrary code via acrafted saved search name.

criterions.comment: request-tracker4 package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
